languages.text: {n}Напряжение в позе и взгляде навигатора становится особенно заметным.{/n} "Я поместил его в защитный саркофаг, более надежный, чем предыдущее вместилище. К сожалению, такой сильный артефакт нельзя было уничтожить в наших условиях — вернее, у меня не было никакой уверенности, что он при этом не развоплотит тут всех и каждого на несколько световых часов вокруг. Но когда мы сойдем с корабля, я непременно найду способ уничтожить эту мерзость".

{n}The tension in his posture and gaze becomes even more noticeable.{/n} "I have placed it inside a protective sarcophagus, more reliable than the previous repository. Unfortunately, an artefact as powerful as this one could not be destroyed under these circumstances — or rather, I had no assurances that it would not disintegrate every one of us and scatter us across several light-hours of neighbouring space. But once we are off the ship, I will absolutely find a way to destroy the vile thing."
languages.original_text: {n}Напряжение в позе и взгляде навигатора становится особенно заметным.{/n} "Я поместил его в защитный саркофаг, более надежный, чем предыдущее вместилище. К сожалению, такой сильный артефакт нельзя было уничтожить в наших условиях — вернее, у меня не было никакой уверенности, что он при этом не развоплотит тут всех и каждого на несколько световых часов вокруг. Но когда мы сойдем с корабля, я непременно найду способ уничтожить эту мерзость".

traits.locale_text: {n}The tension in his posture and gaze becomes even more noticeable.{/n} "I have placed it inside a protective sarcophagus, more reliable than the previous repository. Unfortunately, an artifact as powerful as this one could not be destroyed under these circumstances — or rather, I had no assurances that it would not disintegrate every one of us and scatter across several light-hours of neighboring space. But once we are off the ship, I will absolutely find a way to destroy the vile thing."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}彼の姿勢と視線から伝わる緊張感が一気に増した。{/n}「以前の保護容器よりも信頼性の高い、保護用の棺の中に入れました。残念ながら、これほど強力な遺物をこの状況で破壊することはできません…というより、一人残らず私たちを分解し、数光年先の近隣空間に霧散させないという保証がどこにもないのです。しかし、船を降りましたら確実にこの下劣なものを破壊する方法を見つけます」
languages.original_text: {n}The tension in his posture and gaze becomes even more noticeable.{/n} "I have placed it inside a protective sarcophagus, more reliable than the previous repository. Unfortunately, an artefact as powerful as this one could not be destroyed under these circumstances — or rather, I had no assurances that it would not disintegrate every one of us and scatter us across several light-hours of neighbouring space. But once we are off the ship, I will absolutely find a way to destroy the vile thing."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の姿勢と視線から伝わる緊張感が一気に増した。{/n}「以前の保護容器よりも信頼性の高い、保護用の棺の中に入れました。残念ながら、これほど強力な遺物をこの状況で破壊することはできません…というより、一人残らず私たちを分解し、数光年先の近隣空間に霧散させないという保証がどこにもないのです。しかし、船を降りましたら確実にこの下劣なものを破壊する方法を見つけます」
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}他的动作与眼神变得更加紧张。{/n}“我把它放在了防护棺柩里，比之前的箱子更加结实。遗憾的是，在这种情况下，我们恐怕无法摧毁如此强大的造物。或者更确切地说，若是一定要摧毁它，我无法保证它不会把我们所有人撕成碎片，变成这片星群之中的灰飞。不过，等我们下了船之后，我一定会想办法摧毁这件邪恶之物。”
languages.original_text: {n}The tension in his posture and gaze becomes even more noticeable.{/n} "I have placed it inside a protective sarcophagus, more reliable than the previous repository. Unfortunately, an artefact as powerful as this one could not be destroyed under these circumstances — or rather, I had no assurances that it would not disintegrate every one of us and scatter us across several light-hours of neighbouring space. But once we are off the ship, I will absolutely find a way to destroy the vile thing."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的动作与眼神变得更加紧张。{/n}“我把它放在了防护棺柩里，比之前的箱子更加结实。遗憾的是，在这种情况下，我们恐怕无法摧毁如此强大的造物。或者更确切地说，若是一定要摧毁它，我无法保证它不会把我们所有人撕成碎片，变成这片星群之中的灰飞。不过，等我们下了船之后，我一定会想办法摧毁这件邪恶之物。”
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}La tensión de su postura y su mirada se vuelve aún más perceptible.{/n} «Lo he colocado en un sarcófago protector, que es más fiable que su anterior envoltorio. Sin embargo, no se puede destruir un artefacto tan poderoso en estas circunstancias. Para ser preciso, no tenía ninguna forma de saber que no nos desintegraría a todos, dispersando nuestros restos en un radio de varias horas luz. Una vez salgamos de la nave, encontraré la forma de destruir ese trasto».
languages.original_text: {n}The tension in his posture and gaze becomes even more noticeable.{/n} "I have placed it inside a protective sarcophagus, more reliable than the previous repository. Unfortunately, an artefact as powerful as this one could not be destroyed under these circumstances — or rather, I had no assurances that it would not disintegrate every one of us and scatter us across several light-hours of neighbouring space. But once we are off the ship, I will absolutely find a way to destroy the vile thing."

traits.locale_text: {n}La tensión de su postura y su mirada se vuelve aún más perceptible.{/n} «Lo he colocado en un sarcófago protector, que es más fiable que su anterior envoltorio. Sin embargo, no se puede destruir un artefacto tan poderoso en estas circunstancias. Para ser preciso, no tenía ninguna forma de saber que no nos desintegraría a todos, dispersando nuestros restos en un radio de varias horas luz. Una vez salgamos de la nave, encontraré la forma de destruir ese trasto».
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}La tension dans sa posture et son regard devient encore plus visible.{/n} « Je l'ai placé dans un sarcophage protecteur, plus fiable que son réceptacle précédent. Malheureusement, un artefact de cette puissance ne pouvait pas être détruit dans ces circonstances... ou plutôt, je ne pouvais pas garantir qu'il n'allait pas tous nous désintégrer et nous éparpiller en milliards de morceaux jusqu'à des années-lumière d'ici. Mais dès que nous aurons quitté ce vaisseau, je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour faire disparaître cet effroyable objet. »
languages.original_text: {n}The tension in his posture and gaze becomes even more noticeable.{/n} "I have placed it inside a protective sarcophagus, more reliable than the previous repository. Unfortunately, an artefact as powerful as this one could not be destroyed under these circumstances — or rather, I had no assurances that it would not disintegrate every one of us and scatter us across several light-hours of neighbouring space. But once we are off the ship, I will absolutely find a way to destroy the vile thing."

traits.locale_text: {n}La tension dans sa posture et son regard devient encore plus visible.{/n} « Je l'ai placé dans un sarcophage protecteur, plus fiable que son réceptacle précédent. Malheureusement, un artefact de cette puissance ne pouvait pas être détruit dans ces circonstances... ou plutôt, je ne pouvais pas garantir qu'il n'allait pas tous nous désintégrer et nous éparpiller en milliards de morceaux jusqu'à des années-lumière d'ici. Mais dès que nous aurons quitté ce vaisseau, je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour faire disparaître cet effroyable objet. »
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Die Anspannung in seiner Haltung und seinem Blick wird noch offensichtlicher.{/n} "Ich habe es in einem schützenden Sarcophagus verwahrt, der verlässlicher ist als das vorherige Behältnis. Leider ist ein so mächtiges Artefakt unter diesen Umständen unzerstörbar – will sagen, ich konnte nicht garantieren, dass es dann alle von uns atomisiert und mehrere Lichtstunden weit im umliegenden Weltraum verteilt. Aber sobald wir das Schiff verlassen haben, werde ich einen Weg finden, das vermaledeite Ding zu zerstören."
languages.original_text: {n}The tension in his posture and gaze becomes even more noticeable.{/n} "I have placed it inside a protective sarcophagus, more reliable than the previous repository. Unfortunately, an artefact as powerful as this one could not be destroyed under these circumstances — or rather, I had no assurances that it would not disintegrate every one of us and scatter us across several light-hours of neighbouring space. But once we are off the ship, I will absolutely find a way to destroy the vile thing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Anspannung in seiner Haltung und seinem Blick wird noch offensichtlicher.{/n} "Ich habe es in einem schützenden Sarcophagus verwahrt, der verlässlicher ist als das vorherige Behältnis. Leider ist ein so mächtiges Artefakt unter diesen Umständen unzerstörbar – will sagen, ich konnte nicht garantieren, dass es dann alle von uns atomisiert und mehrere Lichtstunden weit im umliegenden Weltraum verteilt. Aber sobald wir das Schiff verlassen haben, werde ich einen Weg finden, das vermaledeite Ding zu zerstören."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Duruşu ve bakışlarındaki gerilim daha da belirgin hâle geliyor.{/n} "Eski kabından daha sağlam, koruyucu bir lahdin içine koydum. Maalesef böylesi güçlü bir eser, bu şartlar altında yok edilemezdi. Daha doğrusu hepimizi parçalara ayırıp bu parçaları uzayda birkaç ışık yılı uzağa saçmayacağının garantisi yoktu. Gemiden indiğimizde bu habis şeyi yok etmenin bir yolunu mutlaka bulacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}The tension in his posture and gaze becomes even more noticeable.{/n} "I have placed it inside a protective sarcophagus, more reliable than the previous repository. Unfortunately, an artefact as powerful as this one could not be destroyed under these circumstances — or rather, I had no assurances that it would not disintegrate every one of us and scatter us across several light-hours of neighbouring space. But once we are off the ship, I will absolutely find a way to destroy the vile thing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Duruşundaki ve bakışlarındaki gerilim daha da belirgin hâle geliyor.{/n} "Eski kabından daha sağlam, koruyucu bir lahitin içine koydum. Maalesef böylesi güçlü bir eser bu şartlar altında yok edilemezdi. Daha doğrusu hepimizi parçalara ayırıp bu parçaları komşu uzay sahalarında birkaç ışık yılı uzağa saçmayacağının garantisi yoktu ama gemiden indiğimizde bu habis şeyi yok etmenin yolunu mutlaka bulacağım."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator
